name: Walter J. Savitch
content: Savitch Walter Savitch Professor Emeritus Department of Computer Science and Engineering University of California, San Diego LaJolla, CA 92093-0114 Due to the volume of email I receive and a disability that makes typing difficult, I am no longer responding to email messages. For matters relating to any of my Java or C++ text books, please contact the book's editor: Matt Goldstein Editor, Computer Science Pearson Education (Addison Wesley and Prentice Hall) matt.goldstein@pearson.com 617-671-3516 February 14, 2010
